description: ScopeRestriction describe one restriction on scopes.  Exactly one option must be non-nil.

literals.description: ExactValues means the scope has to match a particular set of strings exactly

clusterRole.description: ClusterRoleScopeRestriction describes restrictions on cluster role scopes

roleNames.description: RoleNames is the list of cluster roles that can referenced.  * means anything

allowEscalation.description: AllowEscalation indicates whether you can request roles and their escalating resources

namespaces.description: Namespaces is the list of namespaces that can be referenced.  * means any of them (including *)
